pr_title: [KOGITO-1920] - Example for persistence in Mongo DB with Quarkus(native image )

timeline.bodyText: @swati-kale I think the solution is good but we shouldnt depend on the mongo client parameter to define if the native items should be produced. I think a better approach would be to check the persistence type. Perhaps extract the logic from the PersistenceGenerator and reuse the type here and as parameter to the generator.
timeline.author: cristianonicolai
